alert.note: Alert for Lake; Mason; Oceana (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 24 at 4:11AM EDT until March 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Some light freezing rain possible as well. Total snow accumulations of greater than 6 inches possible. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Mason, Lake and Oceana counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will develop overnight Friday night and into Saturday morning. Much of the precipitation is expected to be snow over West Central Lower Michigan, but some freezing rain may mix in as well. Snowfall totals by Saturday evening have the potential to exceed 6 inches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
